rqa.model.document_retrieval.tfidf module¶

class rqa.model.document_retrieval.tfidf.TFIDF(docs, k=1)[source]¶

Bases: rqa.model.document_retrieval.base.RetrievalIndependentModelBase

TF-IDF document retrieval model

  • Term Frequency
  • Inverse Document Frequency
  • log(tf + 1) * log((N - Nt + 0.5) / (Nt + 0.5))
  • Args:
    docs: documents consisting of title and content vocab: word token’s vocab
  • Kwargs:
    k: the number of top k results
build_vocab(docs)[source]¶
closest_docs(query, k=1)[source]¶
init_model()[source]¶
parse(query, ngram=1)[source]¶
text_to_tfidf(query)[source]¶

Create a tfidf-weighted word vector from query.

tfidf = log(tf + 1) * log((N - Nt + 0.5) / (Nt + 0.5))
